committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands

official_title: To authorize a study of methods to protect and interpret the nationally significant fossil trackways found in the Robledo Mountains near Las Cruces, New Mexico.

summary.text: Prehistoric Trackways Study Act of 1990 - Withdraws approximately 40 acres in the Robledo Mountains in New Mexico from the operation of public land laws, except for mineral leasing, for up to two years after conclusion of the study mandated by this Act. Directs the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a study of the alternatives for the protection and interpretation of the fossil resources of the Robledo Mountains. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: To authorize a study of methods to protect and interpret the nationally significant fossil trackways found in the Robledo Mountains near Las Cruces, New Mexico.
